en.profileDescription:
I am a System Engineer with diplomas in Python and DevNet, and a technologist in analysis and development of information system. I have 8 years of experience in software development, focusing on backend and frontend, artificial intelligence, implementing monolithic and microservices architectural patterns, distributed systems, and object-oriented programming. I Also have experience in modeling and managing databases, as well as designing UML diagrams, Test-driven development(Tdd). 

 I possess experience leading both team and individual projects using agile methodologies like Scrum and Kanban, as well as traditional ones, I have been involved in every stage and process, including implementation and deployment, ensuring compliance, usability, scalability, and security. 

 My experience spans various sectors including banking and finance, payroll and electronic invoicing, social security, travel and tourism, marketing, legal services, public and private services, freelancing, consulting, and teaching programming classes to students.

workExperience.softwareOne:
- As a Developer, Architecture, Analyst, Designer, Integrator, Tester, Documentation, Assessment, and Estimation of new project or requirements. 

- Project reception, new tenders, migrations, development, new functionalities, and deployments, using (Python, FastAPI, Django, Flask, MongoDB, Postgresql) for AFINIA (energy services company). Projects such as (Virtual billing analyst, Virtual intelligence Analysis, Virtual claims Analyst, Optimization and Maintenance of Schedules and Fraud Alarms.) 

- Server administration, development of new features, image analysis, best_selling products, statistical data analysis, data transformation, identifying trends and patterns, with (AI, NPL, OCR Optical character recognition, TQDM, NLTK, Poetry, Uvicorn, PySpark, Google Cloud > VM instances, FastApi,  Power BI and MDS, Power Platform, Dataverse.) for Lucro (Alpina, Postobon) projects such as (Recognition Service). 

- Support, analysis, and development of new functionalities with (Java, Oracle, Angular, Jacoco) for EMP (Medellin public companies projects such as (Budget capture and Contracting plan). 

- Development of a new project, integrations, active directory, microservices with (Java, Spring Boot, AWS, LDAP, Rest, Soap, ChatBoot, Sql y NoSql) for CCB (Camara de comercio). projects such as (Redesign of Registration and payment, Change of Address, Board Members and Mentors, SICO, Immediate Reaction Line).
workExperience.stefaniniITSolutions:
- Definition and interpretation of architecture, support in the construction and development of microservices and API's Systems and components integration, data transformation (xml to json), batch services, Pull Request Pipeline, TDD. Managements of clients and companies that contribute to and pay social security as a natural or legal person, using (Python, JavaScript, AWS, S3, EC2, RDS, WAF, Cognito, SQS, SES, Lambda, Secret Manager, DynamoDB,  REST, SOAP, Jenkins, Sql Server, Oracle PL/Sql, Mocks). For projects like (Online Contributions, BBVA Bank, Occidente Banck, AvVilla Banck, Popular Bank, and Mareigua. 

- Development of an application that provides insurance for workers who suffer accidents or illnesses), using (Java and Oracle), for the (Alfa Insurance) project.
workExperience.carvajalTyS:
- Design, construction, and integration of the solution, implement structure, patterns, and architecture diagrams, development of microservices and APIs, Gateway, system and component integration, data transformation (Xml to Json), batch service, SSL/TLS Certificates, DIAN Service, Electronic signature, Token, Pull Request, Pipeline, using (Java Spring Boot, AWS, S3, EC2, RDS, SQS, Kubernetes, Docker, Angular, Postgresql, SqlServer, REST, SOAP). For the (E_BUSINESS) project (PayRoll). 

- Development of a web and mobile application that allows users to register and vote for government elections, as well as view the results, fingerprint reading, barcode, using (Python, Java, Gradle, Oracle, Azure Cloud servers, Angular.) For the project (IDC Citizen election registration, Electronic voting.)
workExperience.gmlAviatur: - Development of an application that allows users to purchase airline tickets, hotels, transportation, and tour packages using points that are purchased. This was achieved using microservices, service bus, and both asymmetric and symmetric cryptography, utilizing technologies such as (Java, .Net Core, Google Authentication, OAuth, SqlServer, REST, SOAP, Wsdl, Maven, Hibernate, ORM, Angular, Blazor and Razor). For the company (Aviatur), and the projects (AviaMarketing, Antojese.Travel, Davivienda.)
workExperience.smartLawTech:
- Development of IT solutions using Big Data and Artificial Intelligence applied to legal process management. I created cognitive, automated, and interactive technologies, also designed bots, intuitive, predictive, coherent, and reliable analysis models that contribute to problem_solving through faster and more accurate decision_making such as document download, background and financial statement analysis, and digital signatures. Using the technologies (Python, Java, Selenium, Core NLP, NLTK, Pandas, Google Services, Firebase, postgresql, SqlServer) Projects and clients such as (robots, prozesslaw.com, Bancolombia, BBVA, Davivienda). 

- I developed a web app (Control panels and alerts) for monitoring  robots or automated tasks, using (Java and Angular).
workExperience.novatecSolutions:
- Creation of an in_house web app for (Novatec) that facilitates financial evaluation of its customers, employees, and products, using (Java, Angular, Oracle Sql). 

- Development of applications for (BBVA, MetLife, Banco Santander) to enable agile hiring of the bank's products. This involved automation, code quality and load tenting, migration from local to global, banking transactions, financial analysis ad reporting, data transformation, using (microservices, REST, SOAP, WCF, Java, C#, continuous integrations with Jenkins, and MongoDB.)

es.profileDescription:
Soy Ingeniero de Sistemas con diplomados en Python y DevNet, y tecnólogo en análisis y desarrollo de sistemas de información. Tengo 7 años de experiencia en desarrollo de software, enfocándome en backend y frontend, inteligencia artificial, implementando patrones arquitectónicos monolíticos y de microservicios, sistemas distribuidos y programación orientada a objetos. También tengo experiencia en modelado y gestión de bases de datos, así como en diseño de diagramas UML. 

 Poseo experiencia liderando proyectos tanto en equipo como individuales utilizando metodologías ágiles como Scrum y Kanban, así como tradicionales, he estado involucrado en cada etapa y proceso, incluyendo implementación y despliegue, asegurando cumplimiento, usabilidad, escalabilidad y seguridad. 

 Mi experiencia abarca diversos sectores incluyendo banca y finanzas, nómina y facturación electrónica, seguridad social, viajes y turismo, marketing, servicios legales, servicios públicos y privados, freelance, consultoría y enseñanza de clases de programación a estudiantes.

workExperience.softwareOne:

- Desarrollo de un nuevo proyecto, integraciones, directorio activo, microservicios con (Java, Sprint Boot, AWS, LDAP, Rest, Soap, ChatBot) para CCB (Cámara de comercio) proyectos como (Rediseño Registro y pago, Trasladó de domicilio, Miembros y mentores de junta, SICO, Línea de reacción Inmediata).
